comments.body:
Stalagmite - A stalagmite is a type of rock formation that rises from the floor of a cave due to the accumulation of material deposited on the floor from ceiling drippings.

Stalagmites are typically composed of calcium carbonate, but may consist of lava, mud, peat, pitch, sand, sinter and amberat.

Stalactites - A stalactite is an icicle-shaped formation that hangs from the ceiling of a cave and is produced by precipitation of minerals from water dripping through the cave ceiling. Most stalactites have pointed tips.

 

(Differences between these two)

Stalagmite: A stalagmite is an upward-growing mound of mineral deposits that have precipitated from water dripping onto the floor of a cave. Most stalagmites have rounded or flattened tips.

Stalactite:  A stalactite is an icicle-shaped formation that hangs from the ceiling of a cave and is produced by precipitation of minerals from water dripping through the cave ceiling. Most stalactites have pointed tips.
imo doesnt really feel like a minecraft creature
Amazing idea!! im loving it and i hope we could make it added to game!
Yoo more anthropods in the game would be amazing
Ya new athropods is a great idea
This is actually really good

I like the idea of the worm, but the sword seems a little overpowered, maybe the worm tooth could be combined with a weapon to repair it and give it more damage at the same time, but give it less durability.
This is actually cool

I was Going to make a post about this (not the plankton, tho, that's something really interesting!), and maybe a waterlogged "Glowcave" in which the glowsquid would spawn more fequently. That would be a good idea, too, in my opinion, bringing more opportunities for blocks and items.
Hmm.. Not sure about this. Wardens seem a bit too strong for there to be multiple at a time

I think this would be great just tweak the number of wardens and maybe it could spread sculk without a mob dying, but if a mob dies near it would make double the amount of sculk and have like a 5% chance of making a new sculk heart if a warden died near it.

I think it would be neutral until you got within 3 blocks of the nest. All swans would become hostile if you either got close to the nest or punched one. They would drop a special feather along with regular feathers to repair elytra or craft wings which make you fall slow/glide. Rockets don’t work with these  and when they break they break forever unlike the elytra. The only way to tame them would be to snatch the eggs and put them in a nest you craft using hay and sticks. But if you go back the geese in the pond will always be hostile.
Another idea I have for horses would be a "halter". This would make the game more realistic. The halters should start white, but then you can dye them.

Also, I don't like how the horses won't rear or run around unless they are being ridden. They only walk. I think it would be cool if they would gallop, canter, trot, walk, and rear, like a real horse.
there needs to be breeds of horses
Yes! Really agree!
There should also be stallions (one per pack) and they would be aggressive towards other stallions, that and horse-related things like carts and like sugar cubes!
Pls vote for dis I beg you

In summary, the eel:
Is very long
Does a lot of damage
Makes swimming sounds
Glows when passive, dark when hunting
Listens for player sounds
Is meant to be scary
Even just letting the glow squid spawn underground would be super cool.
They could bury in mud and be collected in a bucket. Ooooh, maybe they drop slimeballs occasionally. It's like a harm-free slime farm!

Also if there are forest temples they should be on the blocks. And they should have the same model as cats. And be able to climb trees and spawn on them. Also u should be able to dye their collars. And they should attack creepers. And they should bring u chicken and rabbit meat. They should be tamed with rabbit meat
They should also travel in groups of 5. They should also be afraid of wolves. And be neutral. And fight red foxes
They should also eat grass
The biomes their in should be every kind of Forest and Taigas and mega Taigas

Hei Mojang. Jeg har 5 ønsker til Minecraft 1.17.

 

1. Kan vi få mer dungens i Minecraft?

2. Kan vi få mais i Minecraft?

3. Kan vi få båter med kister, arbeidsbenk og ovn?

4. Kan vi få gruve vogner som kan henge sammen med kjetting?

5. Kan 1.18 være en oppdatering til The End?

 

hilsen Oliver (10 år)
Doesn’t the warden already do this? Maybe instead make the warden prioritize being within x number of blocks of loot instead.

I think that they may have already covered that with the new warden mob. If you saw in the trailer there was an old shack in the deep dark so it even protects loot already. But still that's only for the deep dark and I can sort of see this fit in.
Still don’t know how the nether mob or water thing didn’t win

What do you think he should drop? There would definitely be an achievement when killing him? Should you be able to resummon him?

Health-wise: I'm thinking 800-1000 Hearts
that sounds to op that means that after taming one u can make it kill the wither with ezz.
yeah, but perhaps not, because of the sunlight thing.
You use soul sand to summon the wither, a raging beast that shoots skulls at the living. I think soul sand has souls of raging people, the opposite of friendly.
One more thing… unlimited health sounds like it is way too op.

I'd think It'd make sense If a new liquid (called nitro-acid) to turn warplers. (a mob that exists In warped forests, which are the beforehand of this mob) Into nitro-warplers (this mob).

Sadness comes with the lack of copper golem around. Would've been perfect! It would be cool to have a redstone mob that would defend your contraption/farm/creation. If I construct my creations outside as I build my mega base around it, I have to be very careful about incidents. Nothing yet, lol.
Sounds a little OP. It'd have to be really rare in order to balance things out.
Maybe mines the mining
The mining thing is OP. Dropping the saddle seems unbalanced, as the only other mob that drops one has 100hp

I think It’s a good Idea we take a few steps back... Perhaps instead of 15 hearts, maybe just a total of 6 hearts on normal mode? The HP count should be 85 and It should be very slow compared to a human player. They should spawn at a Semi-rare pace and serve as a Common mini-boss
do u have a photo?
Very cool! The soarers are a great idea! Not too overpowered as well! I hope this will be added to Minecraft!

How are they not overpowered ! Flying is meant to be a feature exclusive to the elytra. That’s its only purpose !!! If players can fly only with a saddle and cheese, there is no point for the elytra or the Ender Dragon fight at all. The loot available in the End Cities and more is available in Bastion Remnants for less risk. The elytra is the only thing worth the End fight.
I disagree because elytra can move for longer and you can use them right away after.
Only problem is, it would be frustrating if you're riding it and it suddenly gets scared and runs in a random direction. If this is added it should not happen if you're mounted on it
Like cows run away when you hit them? Yes, that would bring more realism to the game.
Big brain
Imagine seeing a trident wielding drowned annihilate a zombie griefing a turtle mother's eggs?
This is a great idea because drowned are currently nuisances.
But Drowned are undead zombies... why would they care?
Now that's mixed up.

When rabbits were introduced, Mojang sneaked in, "the killer bunny". It was removed; adding a jackalope would somewhat fill its place (the killer bunny was an easter egg).

More mobs based from mythology should be in the game anyway.
And then when I find them, after a very very VERY long time of searching...what does it do? Is it an Easter egg sort of thing?
Jackalopes should be tameable and should give nearby enemys negative effects like slowness or weakness.

When you find the jackalope , the little bugger will try to give you the slip if you stay on its tail the jackalope leads you to a ultra rare treasure or a field of dancing bunnies for the easter egg. If you kill it you could mount its little antlers on the wall.
